programme.title: The African Americans: Many Rivers to Cross
programme.desc: See how black lives changed dramatically in the aftermath of the American Revolution. King Cotton fuelled the rapid expansion of slavery into new territories and forced the relocation of African American's to the Deep South.

programme.title: The African Americans: Many Rivers to Cross
programme.desc: Examining the most tumultuous and consequential period in African- American history; the Civil War and the end of slavery.

programme.title: The African Americans: Many Rivers to Cross
